valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Sun 21 Sep 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Mon 22 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Humber 998 moves quickly eastwards and loses its identity by midnight tonight. New low expected Biscay 1015 by same time
